GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves a single article by article id number

exampleResponse.title: UNCOVERED: catspiracy to bring down democracy
exampleResponse.author: rogersop
exampleResponse.body: Bastet walks amongst us, and the cats are taking arms!

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments by article id number

comments.author: butter_bridge
comments.body: This morning, I showered for nine minutes.

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: adds a comment for an article

comments.author: butter_bridge
comments.body: This morning, I showered for nine minutes.

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: increments the vote count positively or negatively for a single article

GET /api/comments/:comment_id.description: serves a single comment by comment id number

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes a given comment by comment id number

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users
